q_en: What is the progress of sewing tasks for William?
gt:
Hello there! ğŸ˜„ Let's take a look at the progress of sewing tasks for our customer, William. Here's a summary of the tasks:

| Task ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status       |
|---------|----------------|------------------|--------------|
| 28      | 210            | 210              | Completed âœ… |
| 29      | 180            | 180              | Completed âœ… |
| 30      | 195            | 195              | Completed âœ… |

All of William's sewing tasks are completed! ğŸ‰ If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'William';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "William"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '8';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer "William"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (8);
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs for the orders of customer "William"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.planned_number, st.completed_number, st.status FROM sewing_tasks st WHERE st.order_product_id IN (28, 29, 30);
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks and their progress for the order products of customer "William"
